column2: The ship? *Liszkiewicz rubs his temple with a finger. There are some liver spots on his hands.* Maybe, it's not so bad for intelligence, unless we get into the fight, of course.
We aren't able to hold out?

We aren't even if it would be a full-fledged zorsan intelligence scout. I've examined data about these ships. Weak armour, light weapons, though high speed and manoeuvrability. You'd rather be more cautious in intelligence, capitan. It won't be easy if we're cought.
I'll take into account your advice, Liszkiewicz. over and out.
